trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipient class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipient 클래스 CMS/PKCS #7 메시지의 수신자를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipient constructor constructs an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 생성 하는 CmsRecipient 생성자는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 지정된 된 받는 사람 인증서를 사용 하 여 클래스 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the recipient certificate.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: Null 참조를 올바른 인수로 받아들이지 않는 메서드에 전달 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

The CmsRecipient constructor constructs an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipient 생성자의 인스턴스를 생성 된 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 지정 된 받는 사람 식별자의 유형 및 받는 사람 인증서를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> 받는 사람 식별자의 형식을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the recipient certificate.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: Null 참조를 올바른 인수로 받아들이지 않는 메서드에 전달 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
The Certificate property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 인증서 속성은 수신자와 연결 된 인증서를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> 수신자와 연결 된 인증서를 보유 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The RecipientIdentifierType property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: RecipientIdentifierType 속성에는 받는 사람 식별자의 유형을 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> 받는 사람 식별자의 형식을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.
